Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier

Class textDocument

java.lang.Object
edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.textDocument
public class textDocument extends Object
Contains the attributes of an input text document including the file's location, its corresponding signature, and any input labels.
